name: commitgit
description: Commits and pushes everything under a specified folder into a Git repo
author: Dan Stocker
helpMarkDown: Checks a folder into Git as part of the build/release process.

inputs.name: DestinationRepo
inputs.label: Destination Repo
inputs.helpMarkDown: Full Git URL of the destination repo. Include protocol (e.g. https://)

inputs.name: DestinationRepoUser
inputs.label: Destination Repo Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: The user name of the source repository. Leave blank for personal access token.

inputs.name: DestinationRepoPass
inputs.label: Destination Repo Password or PAT
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password or personal access token for the source repository. (if required)

inputs.name: Branch
inputs.label: Branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the branch for the commit

inputs.name: CommitUserName
inputs.label: Commit User Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the user name that should be used for the commit.

inputs.name: CommitEMail
inputs.label: Commit User e-mail address
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the e-mail address that should appear against the commit.

inputs.name: CommitMessage
inputs.label: Commit Message
inputs.defaultValue: Automatic commit initiated by the vNext agent

inputs.name: Path
inputs.label: Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Everything under this path will be commited to the git repo, maintaining the existing folder structure. If you leave this box empty, then everything in the current drop folder will be commited.
